questions.intro: The questions will be about feedback on this system. All questions hereafter will be on a scale from 1 to 5. One meaning the least, and five meaning the most.
questions.text: On a scale from 1 to 5, how useful was I?
On a scale of 1 to 5, how clear were the questions?
On a scale of 1 to 5, how comfortable did you feel answering the questions?
